item.title: About Us
item.description:
Our Mission

Welcome to PTNews Store, your number one source for the latest world news. We’re dedicated to giving you the very best of journalism, with a focus on reliability, perspective, and real-time updates.

Founded in 2025, PTNews Store has come a long way from its beginnings. When we first started out, our passion for unbiased, aggregated news drove us to build a platform that could offer a comprehensive view of world events. We now serve readers all over the globe and are thrilled that we’re able to turn our passion into our own website.

item.title: Contact Us
item.description:
Get in Touch

We would love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, a news tip, or feedback on our service, please feel free to reach out.

General Inquiries

For all general questions, please email us at: contact@ptnews.store

Press & Media

For all press and media inquiries, please contact our media relations team at: media@ptnews.store

Office Address

PTNews Store Headquarters 123 News Avenue Journalism City, 10101 World

We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours. Thank you for your interest in PTNews Store.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Introduction

Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how PTNews Store (“we”, “us”, or “our”) collects, uses, and discloses information about you. This Privacy Policy applies when you use our website and services.

Information We Collect

We do not collect any personal information from our visitors directly. Our news content is aggregated from various public RSS feeds.

How We Use Information

We do not use any personal information, as we do not collect it. The content on our site is for informational purposes only.
